BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Uniform land use review procedure application no. 990235 PCQ, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning the site selection and acquisition of real property located at 30-03 Review Avenue aka 30-10 Starr Avenue and 30-21 Starr Avenue, Borough of Queens, Council District no. 26, for use as a as a vehicle repair facility and offices, and use as a parking lot respectively.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(3) of the Charter.

The submission of a site plan by the New York City School Construction Authority, pursuant to §1732 of the New York State Public Authorities Law, for a school, Magen David Yeshiva, to be located at 50 Avenue P, Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no. 44.  (Non-ULURP no. 20005056 SCK)

The submission of a site plan by the New York City School Construction Authority, pursuant to §1732 of the New York State Public Authorities Law, for a school, Magen David Yeshiva, to be located at 50 Avenue P, Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no. 44.  (Non-ULURP no. 20005056 SCK)

Uniform land use review procedure application no. 990235 PCQ, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning the site selection and acquisition of real property located at 30-03 Review Avenue aka 30-10 Starr Avenue and 30-21 Starr Avenue, Borough of Queens, Council District no. 26, for use as a as a vehicle repair facility and offices, and use as a parking lot respectively.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(3) of the Charter.
